/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with vibrant advertisements and billboards that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cityscapes. The image is bathed in the light of the sun, which shines brightly from the right side of the frame, casting shadows and highlighting the city's architectural details.
